text: Bad Dürkheim is a district in Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. The district is located on the eastern rim of the Palatinate Forest. == Towns and municipalities == Verband-free towns Verband-free municipality #Bad Dürkheim #Grünstadt #Haßloch Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden Verbandsgemeinden *1.
